clinical_study.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Statins for Chinese Patients With Dyslipidemia
clinical_study.official_title: Safety and Efficacy of Statins for Chinese Patients With Dyslipidemia: A Network Register-based Follow-up Study

collaborator.agency: Jiangsu Wanbang Medicine Marketing Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is designed to verify the clinical efficacy and safety of different statins in dyslipidemia patients, and explore the effects on glycometabolic in patients with impaired glucose regulation.

detailed_description.textblock:
Study Objective:
1. The main Objective: To explore the effects of different statins lipid-lowering treatment on glucose metabolism in patients with impaired glucose regulation in a large sample of Chinese population;
2. The secondary Objective: To obtain real-world evidence of the clinical efficacy and safety of statins lipid-lowering therapy in Chinese patients.
Study Design: The study was an open-label, multi-center network register-based follow-up study.
The total sample size: 10000 participants.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Participants are assigned to one of two or more groups in parallel for the duration of the study.
